title: can someone please help me
body: my league is opening for the old client, but when I press launch it just closes instantly, but for the new client it doesn't say launch it just opens it, I had the new client then the file got corrupted, so i had to reinstall it, when I did it the old client showed, even the icon of the old client is showing, I tried reinstalling league twice, but still it didn't work, I just really want to play league and because of this I can, so if you guys know anything that can help please let me know.

replies.body: Trying to load the old client patcher file would just prompt you to install the updated client, so it wouldn't do you much good in this case.  It sounds to me like a security setting might be preventing you from properly installing and accessing the updated client.  Go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that the new application is added as an exception to your system or any anti-virus software you might have.  Once complete, I suggest doing a clean reinstall through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure everything installs without issue.  Hopefully that will do the trick!
